Module humphrey.partsproject
Package humphrey.controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
humphrey.controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class control the Modify Product Screen. It loads attributes from a product object selected on the main screen and allows the user to make changes.
